member.name: P:ActiveQueryBuilder.View.Properties.Resources.SQLiteSyntaxProvider_Functions
member.summary:
Looks up a localized string similar to avg avg avg(%CURSOR%) avg(X)
Returns the average value of all non-NULL X within a group. String and BLOB values that do not look like numbers are interpreted as 0. The result of avg() is always a floating point value as long as at there is at least one non-NULL input even if all inputs are integers. The result of avg() is NULL if and only if there are no non-NULL inputs. count count count(%CURSOR%) count(X)
count(*)
The first form return a count of the number of times that X is not NULL in a group [rest of string was truncated]";.

member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to avg min max sum count like between in order by collate asc desc limit offset union all except intersect where having select distinct group as from cross join inner left right full outer on or and not is null glob regexp escape notnull isnull exists case when then else end bigint int8 bigserial serial8 int int4 integer bool boolean box bytea cidr circle date double precision float8 inet line lseg macaddr money path point polygon real [rest of string was truncated]";.

member.name: P:ActiveQueryBuilder.View.Properties.Resources.SybaseSyntaxProvider_Functions
member.summary:
Looks up a localized string similar to abs ABS ABS(%CURSOR%) ABS( numeric-expression )
Returns the absolute value of a numeric expression. acos ACOS ACOS(%CURSOR%) ACOS( numeric-expression )
Returns the arc-cosine, in radians, of a numeric expression. argn ARGN ARGN(%CURSOR%) ARGN( integer-expression, expression [ , ...] )
Returns a selected argument from a list of arguments. ascii ASCII ASCII(%CURSOR%) ASCII( string-expression )
Returns the integer ASCII value of the first byte in a string-expression. asin ASIN ASIN(%CURSO [rest of string was truncated]";.

member.name: P:ActiveQueryBuilder.View.Properties.Resources.SybaseSyntaxProvider_Keywords
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to avg sum count count_big max min like between in with as order by asc desc union all except intersect where having select distinct first top starting at group option hash join concat merge loop fast force maxdop robust plan keep keepfixed expand views for browse xml raw auto explicit xmldata elements binary base64 or and not true false is null unknown escape exists some any bigint int integer smallint tinyint bit real money smallmoney [rest of string was truncated]";.

member.name: P:ActiveQueryBuilder.View.Properties.Resources.VistaDBSyntaxProvider_Functions
member.summary:
Looks up a localized string similar to ascii ASCII ASCII(%CURSOR%) ASCII(char)
Returns the ASCII code of the first character in the expression. lower LOWER LOWER(%CURSOR%) LOWER(string)
Returns the lower case of the string in the expression. unicode UNICODE UNICODE(%CURSOR%) UNICODE('ncharacter_expression')
Returns the integer value, as defined by the Unicode standard, for the first character of the input expression. upper UPPER UPPER(%CURSOR%) UPPER(string)
Returns the upper case of the string in the expression. char CHAR [rest of string was truncated]";.

member.name: P:ActiveQueryBuilder.View.Properties.Resources.VistaDBSyntaxProvider_Keywords
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to add all alter and any as asc authorization backup begin between break browse bulk by cascade case check checkpoint close clustered coalesce collate column commit compute constraint contains containstable continue convert create cross current current_date current_time current_timestamp current_user cursor database datetime2 datetimeoffset dbcc deallocate declare default delete deny desc disk distinct distributed double drop dump else end errlvl escape except exec execute exists exit external fetch fil [rest of string was truncated]";.

member.name: P:ActiveQueryBuilder.View.PaneDockOptions.AutoHide
member.summary: Prescribes the sidebar panel to be auto-collapsed or pinned next to the Design Pane.

member.name: P:ActiveQueryBuilder.View.PaneDockOptions.Position
member.summary: Determines the side of sidebar panel. (left or right)

member.name: T:ActiveQueryBuilder.View.PanesConfigurationOptions
member.summary: Allows you to configure layout of the main parts of the component: Design Pane, Query Columns Pane, Database Schema Tree and Query Structure Tree.
member.remarks: To configure tabs above the Design Pane, see the property group.

member.name: P:ActiveQueryBuilder.View.PanesConfigurationOptions.QueryColumnsPaneHeight
member.summary: Determines height of the Query Columns Pane.

member.name: P:ActiveQueryBuilder.View.PanesConfigurationOptions.UserQueriesPaneHeight
member.summary: Gets or sets the height of User Queries pane.
member.remarks: User Queries pane is available in Professional Edition only.

member.name: P:ActiveQueryBuilder.View.PanesConfigurationOptions.DatabaseSchemaViewWidth
member.summary: Determines width of the right tree pane.

member.name: P:ActiveQueryBuilder.View.PanesConfigurationOptions.SubQueryNavBarDockOptions
member.summary: Determines the initial state of the Sub-query Navigation Bar sidebar panel. (default: collapsed at the right side)

member.name: P:ActiveQueryBuilder.View.PanesConfigurationOptions.PropertiesBarDockOptions
member.summary: determines the initial state of the Properties Bar sidebar panel. (default: collapsed at the right side)

member.name: P:ActiveQueryBuilder.View.PanesConfigurationOptions.DesignPaneVisible
member.summary: Determines visibility of the Design Pane.
member.remarks: On hiding the Design Pane, don't forget to set the and properties to true and allow showing of fields in the database objects tree using the property.

member.name: P:ActiveQueryBuilder.View.PanesConfigurationOptions.QueryColumnsPaneVisible
member.summary: Determines visibility of the Query Columns Pane (grid with expressions and criteria below the Design Pane).

member.name: P:ActiveQueryBuilder.View.PanesConfigurationOptions.UserQueriesPaneVisible
member.summary: Determines visibility of User Queries pane.
member.remarks: User Queries pane is available in Professional Edition only.

member.name: P:ActiveQueryBuilder.View.PanesConfigurationOptions.QueryNavigationBarVisible
member.summary: Determines visibility of sub-query tabs above the Design Pane.
member.remarks: You can navigate sub-queries using the Query Structure Tree instead of sub-query tabs.

member.name: P:ActiveQueryBuilder.View.PanesConfigurationOptions.DatabaseSchemaViewVisible
member.summary: Determines visibility of the right tree pane.
member.remarks: Content of the right and left tree panes is determined according to the SwapTrees property.

member.name: P:ActiveQueryBuilder.View.PanesConfigurationOptions.SubQueryNavBarEnabled
member.summary: Enables/disables the Sub-query Navigation Bar control as a sidebar dockable panel.
member.remarks: If it's disabled, the user still can manage set operators and common table expressions via the pop-up window of the Query Navigation Bar.

member.name: P:ActiveQueryBuilder.View.PanesConfigurationOptions.PropertiesBarEnabled
member.summary: Enables/disables the Properties Bar control as a sidebar dockable panel.
member.remarks: If it's disabled, the user still can edit the query, datasource and link properties using the dialog windows by right-clicking on appropriate elements and selecting the "Properties..." pop-up menu item.

member.name: T:ActiveQueryBuilder.View.QueryView.IDatabaseSchemaViewOptions
member.summary: Contains various options of the Database Schema Tree.

member.name: P:ActiveQueryBuilder.View.QueryView.IDatabaseSchemaViewOptions.SortingType
member.summary: Defines order of database object nodes within a group.

member.name: P:ActiveQueryBuilder.View.QueryView.IDatabaseSchemaViewOptions.ViewMode
member.summary: Gets or sets the view mode.

member.name: P:ActiveQueryBuilder.View.QueryView.IDatabaseSchemaViewOptions.MaxToolTipWidth
member.summary: Gets or sets the maximum width of the tool tip.
member.value: The maximum width of the tool tip.

member.name: P:ActiveQueryBuilder.View.QueryView.IDatabaseSchemaViewOptions.AllowRenameNodes
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the renaming of nodes is allowed.
member.value: true if nodes renaming is allowed; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:ActiveQueryBuilder.View.QueryView.IDatabaseSchemaViewOptions.SearchFields
member.summary: Instructs to search for field names in addition to default searching for object names.

member.name: P:ActiveQueryBuilder.View.QueryView.IDatabaseSchemaViewOptions.SearchBoxVisible
member.summary: Determines visibility of the search box.

member.name: P:ActiveQueryBuilder.View.QueryView.IDatabaseSchemaViewOptions.ShowFields
member.summary: Instructs the component to show fields of database objects in the tree.
member.remarks: Setting this property to true is necessary if you want to use the component without Design Pane. See the property for details.

member.name: P:ActiveQueryBuilder.View.QueryView.IDatabaseSchemaViewOptions.ShowDescriptionTooltips
member.summary: Instructs the component to show or hide description tooltip over the database schema tree nodes.

member.name: P:ActiveQueryBuilder.View.QueryView.IDatabaseSchemaViewOptions.DescriptionTooltipsDelay
member.summary: Gets or sets the delay of description tooltip over the database schema tree nodes.

member.name: P:ActiveQueryBuilder.View.QueryView.IDatabaseSchemaViewOptions.DefaultExpandLevel
member.summary: Determines the level of initial Database Schema Tree nodes expansion.
member.value: Zero value instructs the component to show database schema tree collapsed; -1 value means full expansion of the tree. Positive values instructs the component to expand to the specified number of tree levels.

member.name: P:ActiveQueryBuilder.View.QueryView.IDatabaseSchemaViewOptions.DefaultExpandMetadataType
member.summary: Determines the types of initial Database Schema Tree nodes expansion.
member.value: Expand nodes of specified types, don't expand all other types.

member.name: P:ActiveQueryBuilder.View.QueryView.IDatabaseSchemaViewOptions.DefaultExpandFolderNodes
member.summary: Prescribes to expand folder nodes on initializing the Database Schema Tree.
member.value: true - folder nodes are initially expanded, false - collapsed.

member.name: P:ActiveQueryBuilder.View.QueryView.IDatabaseSchemaViewOptions.DrawTreeLines
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether [draw tree lines].
member.value: true if [draw tree lines]; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:ActiveQueryBuilder.View.QueryView.IDatabaseSchemaViewOptions.SearchBoxDocking
member.summary: Determines search box docking position.

member.name: P:ActiveQueryBuilder.View.QueryView.IDatabaseSchemaViewOptions.ImageIndices
member.summary: Gets or sets the image indices.

member.name: M:ActiveQueryBuilder.View.QueryView.IDatabaseSchemaViewOptions.Assign(ActiveQueryBuilder.View.QueryView.IDatabaseSchemaViewOptions)
member.summary: Assigns the specified source.

member.name: F:ActiveQueryBuilder.View.QueryView.FieldListSortType.None
member.summary: Denies field list sorting; fields are shown in the list as they were retrieved from a database.

member.name: F:ActiveQueryBuilder.View.QueryView.FieldListSortType.Name
member.summary: Specifies field list sorting by Name.

member.name: F:ActiveQueryBuilder.View.QueryView.FieldListSortType.Description
member.summary: Specifies field list sorting by Description.

summary.para: Determines possible values for visibility of the Design Pane Overview.

member.name: F:ActiveQueryBuilder.View.QueryView.DesignPaneOverviewVisibility.Hidden
member.summary: Design Pane Overview is always hidden.

member.name: F:ActiveQueryBuilder.View.QueryView.DesignPaneOverviewVisibility.Visible
member.summary: Design Pane Overview is always visible.

member.name: F:ActiveQueryBuilder.View.QueryView.DesignPaneOverviewVisibility.Auto
member.summary: Design Pane Overview shows up if necessary.

member.name: T:ActiveQueryBuilder.View.QueryView.IDesignPaneOptions
member.summary: Contains various properties of Design Pane.

member.name: P:ActiveQueryBuilder.View.QueryView.IDesignPaneOptions.Background
member.summary: Gets or sets the background for the Design Pane.

member.name: P:ActiveQueryBuilder.View.QueryView.IDesignPaneOptions.SnapToGrid
member.summary: Determines the size of each square of the grid used for snapping of the objects at Design Pane.

member.name: P:ActiveQueryBuilder.View.QueryView.IDesignPaneOptions.GridSize
member.summary: Enables or disables whether objects at the Design Pane are automatically placed at grid coordinates.

member.name: P:ActiveQueryBuilder.View.QueryView.IDesignPaneOptions.DesignPaneOverviewWidth
member.summary: Gets or sets the max width of the Design Pane Overview window.

member.name: P:ActiveQueryBuilder.View.QueryView.IDesignPaneOptions.DesignPaneOverviewMaxHeight
member.summary: Gets or sets the max height of the Design Pane Overview window in percent. Valid value between 0 and 1

member.name: P:ActiveQueryBuilder.View.QueryView.IDesignPaneOptions.LinkStyle
member.summary: Determines style of links between objects at Design Pane.

remarks.para: You can choose from one of the following styles:

list.item: Simple style: circles are displayed at the ends of line in case of INNER join type; arrows replace circles in case of OUTER join types.

MS Access style: no markers are displayed at the ends of line in case of INNER join type; arrows are added to appropriate ends of line in case or OUTER joins. Also "1" and infinity signs are shown above the ends of line if this join has a corresponding foreign key relationship loaded from database to the Metadata Container.
SQL Server Management Studio style: a diamond is displayed in the middle of line in case of INNER join type; a rectangle is added to it at appropriate side of line in case of OUTER join types.

member.name: P:ActiveQueryBuilder.View.QueryView.IDesignPaneOptions.DesignPaneOverviewVisible
member.summary: Determines visibility of the Design Pane Overview.
member.remarks: The Design Pane Overview is located in the bottom right corner of the Design Pane. It is intended to ease the navigation over large query diagrams.

member.name: P:ActiveQueryBuilder.View.QueryView.IDesignPaneOptions.LinkPainterOptions
member.summary: Gets or sets the link painter options.

member.name: F:ActiveQueryBuilder.View.QueryView.AffectedColumns.AllColumns
